mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders ( orderId, gst, area, contact, deliveryLatitude, deliveryLongitude, deviceToken, items, orderDate, orderTime, orderedBy, shop, shopAddress, totalPrice, totalPriceAfterDiscount, statusCode ) VALUES ( #{orderId}, #{order.GST}, #{order.area}, #{order.contact}, #{order.deliveryLatitude}, #{order.deliveryLongitude}, #{order.deviceToken}, #{order.itemsJSON}, #{order.orderDateRectified}, #{order.orderTime}, #{order.orderedBy}, #{order.shop}, #{order.shopAddress}, #{order.totalPrice}, #{order.totalPriceAfterDiscount}, #{order.orderStatus} )
